name: WhalePhoto
0:
”Alexa, turn on Frame.”
”Alexa, turn off Frame.”
”Alexa, mute on Frame.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
“Whale Photo” is a skill for all smart devices with Whale Photo/Uhale OS.
Successful device binding enables giving commands to the smart photo frame using voice instructions. 
Users can also use a device without a screen as a controller for the Whale Photo skill, such as Echo Dot or Echo Plus.

This skill requires Whale Photo/Uhale account and a compatible frame in order to work.
1. Apply for a Whale Photo/Uhale/iDolphin account through the Whale Photo/Uable/iDolphin APP.
2. Open the Alexa APP, find “More-Skill&Games”and search for“Whale Photo”to connect the accounts. 
3. After the accounts are successfully connected, search and connect the photo frame under “Devices”.
4. Complete above settings and start voice-control the photo frame using the command statements. For example: “Alexa, turn on Frame”.

To turn the frame screen on or off, say:
“Alexa, turn on Frame.”
“Alexa, turn off Frame.”

To control the volume, say:
“Alexa, volume up on Frame.”
“Alexa, volume down on Frame.”
“Alexa, mute on Frame.”
“Alexa, unmute on Frame.”

To locate directories, say:
“Alexa, go home on Frame.”
“Alexa, go settings on Frame.”
Enjoy!
